name: Air Hockey Tactics - Free
description:
Fast and exciting air hockey game. But with a spiked gameplay. Use your helper to defend the goal. Choose tactics: defense or attack or why not both. Upgrade before your opponent and gain the upper hand. Five points will make you a winner.

2 Player game (on same tablet). No internet required.

For the family on vacation and the kids in the backseat of your car.

Free version, NO pay to win. All features for free, NO accidental "in-app purchases".
